statement.name: INSERT_SMAOFR
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smaofr( codcia, agnprs, prdprs, codofr, tpoofr, nroofr, qpoofr, tpopgm, sndeml, insofr, preofr, slcofr, mtrofr, nomofr, obsofr, bgnofr, endofr, nrodqr, vlrofr, stdofr, bgsofr, ensofr, pinofr, phoofr, ncoofr, frmofr, firofr, ffrofr, sqlbkr, prgofr, sgnofr, horofr, hofofr, hosofr, hsfofr, hopofr,hpfofr, bgndoc, enddoc, fctofr ,nrodbe) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?,?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAOFR
statement.sql: UPDATE smaofr SET codcia=?, agnprs=?, prdprs=?, tpoofr=?, nroofr=?, qpoofr=?, tpopgm=?, sndeml=?, insofr=?, preofr=?, slcofr=?, mtrofr=?, nomofr=?, obsofr=?, bgnofr=?, endofr=?, nrodqr=?, vlrofr=?, stdofr=?, bgsofr=?, ensofr=?, pinofr=?, ncoofr=?, frmofr=?, firofr=?, ffrofr=?, sqlbkr=?, prgofr=?, sgnofr=?, horofr=?, hofofr=?, hosofr=?, hsfofr=?, hopofr=?, hpfofr=?, bgndoc=?, enddoc=? , fctofr =? WHERE codofr=?

statement.name: UPDATE_FOTO_SMAOFR
statement.sql: UPDATE smaofr set phoofr=? WHERE codofr=?
